title: Free san-serif font - sample is italicized.
content:
Hi folks!

If it helps any, I remember this was a free font - quite popular a few years back. I only have the outlines version of this logo, so I'm having a hard time identifying the font. Any help would be appreciated - thanks!

Font: 

 Day 

Solved By: 

 [osamu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054856/http:/typophile.com/user/215937 "View user profile.")

author: SunnyGosal

comments.content: It looks like [Days](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054856/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Days) by Alexander Kalachev.
